        protected abstract boolean onPageReady(boolean loc,

                                       @Nullable
                                       Collection<?> data,
                                       boolean finished,
                                       @Nullable

        Called when data for page is ready.
        Parameters:

        qryInfo - Query info.
        data - Result data.
        finished - Last page or not.
        e - Exception in case of error.
        Returns:
        true if page was processed right.
